timeline.bodyText: @olegmoz is this suppression necessary here? I'd suggest not to add it if not, as generally this check is connected to the complexity of the class and when we have to add this suppression it's the first signal to required decomposition.
timeline.author: olenagerasimova
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,87 @@

+

+ *
+ * @since 0.12
+ * @checkstyle ClassDataAbstractionCouplingCheck (500 lines)

replies.bodyText: @olenagerasimova that suppression was here by mistake, I totally agree that this warning is meaningful in production code
replies.author: olegmoz
